metadata.title: CVE-2021-27292 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ua-parser-js >= 0.7.14, fixed in 0.7.24, uses a regular expression which isvulnerable to denial of service. If an attacker sends a maliciousUser-Agent header, ua-parser-js will get stuck processing it for anextended period of time.

criterions.comment: node-ua-parser-js package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
